name: Arach Chess
description:
You're an ancient Celtic Arach (Celtic Dragon), and you're in command of an army of animals. Each with a unique set of skills to help you defeat your enemies!

Play single player strategy game against the computer. Play Multiplayer against your friends or a random foe!

Use your Dragon's magic fireball and heals to lead your army to victory!

Use your Wyvern's magic fireball to harm your most powerful enemies!

The Unicorn and Wulver heal and bite! The Lion and Bear have very strong claw attacks! The Elephant is an unstoppable tank! The Eagle will menace your foes from the air!

Place Mountains and Volcanoes for added defense! The Dragon and Wyvern gain power to their magic when sitting on a Volcano.

Good Luck!!!!!!
